sense.gloss: stripping (of rights, office, etc.), deprivation, forfeit, revocation, divestiture
detachment, coming off, peeling off, exfoliation
to tear off, to peel off, to rip off, to strip off, to skin, to flay, to disrobe, to deprive of, to detach, to disconnect
to become angry or sullen, to take offense, to be miffed, to be upset
to come unstuck from, to peel off, to come off, to be taken off
to tear off, to rip off
to skin (one's knee), to graze, to scratch

sdata.j: ↑王↑↓おう↓は↑権力↑↓けんりょく↓を↑剥奪↑↓はくだつ↓された。
sdata.e: The king was stripped of his power.

sdata.j: ペンキが↑剥↑↓は↓げてるよ。
その↑反逆↑↓はんぎゃく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓は↑市民↑↓しみん↓↑権↑↓けん↓を↑剥奪↑↓はくだつ↓された。
sdata.e: The traitor was deprived of his citizenship.

sdata.j: その↑家↑↓いえ↓は↑暴風↑↓ぼうふう↓の↑為↑↓ため↓に↑屋根↑↓やね↓を↑剥↑↓は↓ぎ↑取↑↓と↓られた。
sdata.e: The house had its roof ripped off by the storm.

sdata.j: ケネス・スターがまたしても↑権力↑↓けんりょく↓を↑濫用↑↓らんよう↓し、↑私↑↓わたし↓がインターネットを↑使↑↓つか↓う↑権利↑↓けんり↓を↑剥奪↑↓はくだつ↓したのです。
sdata.e: Kenneth Starr abused his power again and took away my right to get on-line.

sdata.j: ５↑年↑↓ねん↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑網膜剥離↑↓もうまくはくり↓を↑起↑↓お↓こしました。
sdata.e: I had retinal detachment five years ago.

sdata.j: ↑州↑↓しゅう↓↑政府↑↓せいふ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓から↑市民↑↓しみん↓↑権↑↓けん↓を↑剥奪↑↓はくだつ↓した。
sdata.e: The state government deprived him of his civil rights.

sdata.j: ↑専制↑↓せんせい↓↑政治↑↓せいじ↓による↑支配↑↓しはい↓の↑下↑↓した↓で、↑罪↑↓つみ↓のない↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓が↑市民↑↓しみん↓↑権↑↓けん↓を↑剥奪↑↓はくだつ↓された。
sdata.e: Under the reign of tyranny, innocent people were deprived of their citizenship.

sdata.j: ↑追↑↓お↓い↑剥↑↓は↓ぎが↑通行人↑↓つうこうにん↓から↑金↑↓きん↓を↑奪↑↓うば↓った。
sdata.e: A highwayman robbed a foot passenger of his money.

sdata.j: ↑転↑↓ころ↓んでひざを↑擦↑↓す↓り↑剥↑↓む↓かないようにしなさい。
sdata.e: Take care not to fall down and skin your knee.

words.gloss: stripping (of rights, office, etc.), deprivation, forfeit, revocation, divestiture
detachment, coming off, peeling off, exfoliation
